testsuite.name: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: And I choose creating new Slideshow from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: And Slideshow Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: When I click the Source button

testcase.name: And I click inside the Source editor

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name:
And I enter '

Title

text \(\frac{a}{b}\) text

' inside the Source editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: And I click the Source button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: Then I see the "a/b" Math Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: When I highlight the text in the element with id "cut"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: And I hit the delete key
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: And I click the element with class "mSlide-title"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: And I enter the control key combination "v"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: Then I see the "a/b" Math Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test 2D math previews on slide after a cut/paste in editor

testcase.name: When I click to Preview the Slideshow
